sdata.e: Recession is a temporary falling off of business activity during a period when such activity is generally increasing.

sdata.e: Kids these days think that any issue in life can be resolved as easily as restarting a computer game.

sdata.j: ↑停電↑↓ていでん↓があってさ、ビデオの↑時間↑↓じかん↓を|リセ|ットしたんだけど、↑１↑↓いち↓↑時間↑↓じかん↓ズレててさっ、↑録画↑↓ろくが↓↑取↑↓と↓り↑損↑↓そこ↓ねちゃったよ。
sdata.e: We had a power outage, so I had to reset the clock on my VCR. However, I was off by an hour, so the program I wanted to record wasn't recorded.

sdata.j: ↑停電↑↓ていでん↓があってさ、ビデオの↑時間↑↓じかん↓を|リセ|ットしたんだけど、↑１↑↓いち↓↑時間↑↓じかん↓ズレててさっ、アポ↑逃↑↓のが↓しちゃったよ。
sdata.e: There was a blackout, so I reset my VCR's time, but I was off by an hour, so I missed my appointment.
